name: Pool 1.5
overview: Pool 1.5 is a 1-4 player pool game. Pool 1.5 has a top-down graphical display of a pool table, and attempts to accurately simulate the physics of pool. Contains 4 types of gameplay: eight ball, straight pool, rotation, and nine ball. Players take turns shooting, and gameplay follows standard rules. The player uses paddles to move their aim 360 degrees. The player can control the strength of their shot from 1 - 8, and 9 locations where on the white ball to hit, to control ball spin. Players can define board friction, and the speed of gameplay. Players can also review their past shot with a replay feature.
